013package org.apache.juneau.rest.client.remote;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.http.HttpHeaders.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
019import java.lang.reflect.*;
020import java.util.*;
021
022import org.apache.juneau.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.http.header.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.http.remote.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
027
028/**
029 * Contains the meta-data about a REST proxy class.
030 *
031 * <p>
032 * Captures the information in {@link org.apache.juneau.http.remote.Remote @Remote} and {@link org.apache.juneau.http.remote.RemoteOp @RemoteOp} annotations for
033 * caching and reuse.
034 *
035 * <ul class='seealso'>
036 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-client.jrc.Proxies">REST Proxies</a>
037 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-client">juneau-rest-client</a>
038 * </ul>
039 */
040public class RemoteMeta {
041
042   private final Map<Method,RemoteOperationMeta> operations;
043   private final HeaderList headers;
044
045   /**
046    * Constructor.
047    *
048    * @param c The interface class annotated with a {@link org.apache.juneau.http.remote.Remote @Remote} annotation (optional).
049    */
050   public RemoteMeta(Class<?> c) {
051      String path = "";
052
053      ClassInfo ci = ClassInfo.of(c);
054      List<Remote> remotes = ci.getAnnotations(Remote.class);
055
056      String versionHeader = "Client-Version", clientVersion = null;
057      HeaderList headers = HeaderList.create().resolving();
058
059      for (Remote r : remotes) {
060         if (isNotEmpty(r.path()))
061            path = trimSlashes(resolve(r.path()));
062         for (String h : r.headers())
063            headers.append(stringHeader(resolve(h)));
064         if (isNotEmpty(r.version()))
065            clientVersion = resolve(r.version());
066         if (isNotEmpty(r.versionHeader()))
067            versionHeader = resolve(r.versionHeader());
068         if (isNotVoid(r.headerList())) {
069            try {
070               headers.append(r.headerList().newInstance().getAll());
071            } catch (Exception e) {
072               throw new BasicRuntimeException(e, "Could not instantiate HeaderSupplier class");
073            }
074         }
075      }
076
077      if (clientVersion != null)
078         headers.append(stringHeader(versionHeader, clientVersion));
079
080      Map<Method,RemoteOperationMeta> operations = map();
081      String path2 = path;
082      ci.forEachPublicMethod(
083         x -> true,
084         x -> operations.put(x.inner(), new RemoteOperationMeta(path2, x.inner(), "GET"))
085      );
086
087      this.operations = unmodifiable(operations);
088      this.headers = headers;
089   }
090
091   /**
092    * Returns the metadata about the specified operation on this resource proxy.
093    *
094    * @param m The method to look up.
095    * @return Metadata about the method or <jk>null</jk> if no metadata was found.
096    */
097   public RemoteOperationMeta getOperationMeta(Method m) {
098      return operations.get(m);
099   }
100
101   /**
102    * Returns the headers to set on all requests.
103    *
104    * @return The headers to set on all requests.
105    */
106   public HeaderList getHeaders() {
107      return headers;
108   }
109
110   //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
111   // Helper methods.
112   //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
113
114   private static String resolve(String s) {
115      return VarResolver.DEFAULT.resolve(s);
116   }
117}
